plot: A filmmaker's production notes recall a low-budget science fiction film he was trying to make with the collaboration of a female acquaintance. Through his ruminations, the narrative turns into a bittersweet tale of unrequited love.
title: Tentoumushi no namida
plot_es: A filmmaker's production notes recall a low-budget science fiction film he was trying to make with the collaboration of a female acquaintance. Through his ruminations, the narrative turns into a bittersweet tale of unrequited love.
plot_en: A filmmaker's production notes recall a low-budget science fiction film he was trying to make with the collaboration of a female acquaintance. Through his ruminations, the narrative turns into a bittersweet tale of unrequited love.
